member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.ComponentContextReader
member.summary: The reader is platform specific and applies to Windows Phone Silverlight applications only.
The reader is platform specific and will contain different implementations for reading specific data based on the platform its running on.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Windows.UnhandledExceptionTelemetryModule
member.summary: A module that deals in Exception events and will create ExceptionTelemetry objects when triggered.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Windows.UnhandledExceptionTelemetryModule.Dispose
member.summary: Unsubscribe from the event.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Windows.UnhandledExceptionTelemetryModule.Initialize(Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.TelemetryConfiguration)
member.summary: Subscribes to unhandled event notifications.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Windows.UnhandledExceptionTelemetryModule.ApplicationOnUnhandledException(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Issues with the previous code - We were changing the exception as handled which should not be done, as the application might want the exception in other unhandled exception event handler. Re throw of the exception triggers the users unhandled exception event handler twice and also caused the infinite loop issue. Creating a new thread is not a good practice and the code will eventually move to persist and send exception on resume as hockeyApp.

member.summary: Initializes property of the context.

member.summary: Initializes this instance of and begins session tracking.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Windows.SessionTelemetryModule.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines if previous user session timed out.
member.remarks: Store apps can be suspended or even closed when user switches back and forth between apps. If the amount of time between the moment an app is closed and then started again is less than we assume that the previous session continues.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsAppInitializer
member.summary: Windows app Initializer is TelemetryConfiguration and TelemetryModules Bootstrap the WindowsApps SDK.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsAppInitializer.InitializeAsync(Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsCollectors)
member.summary: Initializes default configuration and starts automatic telemetry collection for specified WindowsCollectors flags. Must specify InstrumentationKey as a parameter or in ApplicationInsights.config. Enumeration flag specifying automatic collectors. By default enable all collectors.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsAppInitializer.InitializeAsync(System.String,Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsCollectors)
member.summary: Initializes default configuration and starts automatic telemetry collection for specified WindowsCollectors flags. Must specify InstrumentationKey as a parameter or in ApplicationInsights.config. InstrumentationKey obtain from http://portal.azure.com Enumeration flag specifying automatic collectors. By default enable all collectors.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsCollectors
member.summary: Windows auto collectors provide automatic collection of telemetry context and automatic collection of telemetry data points for Windows Applications.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsCollectors.Metadata
member.summary: Collector to auto populate TelemetryContext for all telemetry.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsCollectors.Session
member.summary: Auto collection of user and session information from application startup.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsCollectors.PageView
member.summary: Auto collection of page view telemetry from view navigation events.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsCollectors.UnhandledException
member.summary: Auto collection of application crashes from unhandled exception handler.
